st: Gam hai ki tumhe apne pyaar ka ehsaas karaa na sake..
s:
Gam hai ki tumhe apne pyaar ka ehsaas karaa na sake..
Tum rooth na jao yeh soach ke tumhe manaa na sake..
Tum gair ke na ho jao kisi mod par..
Iss darse kabhi tumhe apnaa na sake

st: Kitna Dur Nikal Gye Riste Nibhate-Nibhate,,
s:
Kitna Dur Nikal Gye Riste Nibhate-Nibhate,,
Khud Ko Kho Diya Humne Apno Ko Pate-Pate…
Log Kahte Hai Dard Hai Mere Dil Me,,
Aur Hum Thak Gye Muskurate-Muskurate…

st: Zindagi humesha kuchh naya dikhayegi,
s:
Zindagi humesha kuchh naya dikhayegi,
Kabhi hasengi toh kabhi rulayegi.
Is par bharosa mat karna,
Ye zindagi hain na jaane kis mod pe akela chhod jaayegi…

st: Kisi ke pyaar ko bhulana na aaya hume,
s:
Kisi ke pyaar ko bhulana na aaya hume,
Kisi ke dil ko dhukhana na aaya hume.
Kisi ke liye tadpna toh seekh liya,
Par apne liye kisi ko tadpana na aaya hume….

st: Yaadon ke Basere mai har pal tum rehti ho,
s:
Yaadon ke Basere mai har pal tum rehti ho,
Paas nahi ho tum toh kya hua,
Aansu bankar har pal tum behti ho…

st: Aapko paakar ab khona nahi chahta,
s:
Aapko paakar ab khona nahi chahta,
Itna khush ho kar ab rona nahi chahta,
Yeh aalam hai humara aapki judaai ka,
Aankho mai neend hai magar sona nahi chahta…

st: Dil ko khareedne waale hazaar mil jaayenge,
s:
Dil ko khareedne waale hazaar mil jaayenge,
Aap ko daga dene wale baar-baar mil jayenge.
Milega na aap ko mere jaisa,
Milne ko toh dost beshumaar mil jayenge…

st: Tadap ke dekho kisi ki chaht main,
s:
Tadap ke dekho kisi ki chaht main,
Toh pata chale INTEZAAR kya hota hai.
Yun hi mil jaaye koi bina chahe,
Toh kiase pata chale ki PYAAR kya hota hai…

st: Hasrat hai sirf unhe paane ki,
s:
Hasrat hai sirf unhe paane ki,
Aur koi khawaish nahi iss deewane ki.
Shikwa mujhe unse nahi khuda se hai,
Kya zarurat thi unhe itna khoobsurat banane ki…

st: Teri khushi se hi nahi,
s:
Teri khushi se hi nahi,
Gam se bhi rishta hai mera….
Tu zindagi ka ek aham hissa hai mera….
Ye dosti tumse sirf Lafzon ki nahi….
Ruh se ruh ka rishta hai mera…..

st: Mohabbat mujhe thi unse itne sanam,
s:
Mohabbat mujhe thi unse itne sanam,
Yadon me dil tadapta raha,
Mout bhi meri chaahat ko rok na saki,
Kabr me bhi dil dhadakta raha.

st: Zaruri to nahi ke insan pyar ki murat ho,
s:
Zaruri to nahi ke insan pyar ki murat ho,
Zaruri to nhi ki insan achha or khubsurat ho
Par sab se sundar woh insan hain,
Jo aapke sath ho jab aapko uski zarurat ho..!

st: Pyar koi barish ka nam nhi
s:
Pyar koi barish ka nam nhi
Jo barse aur tham jaaye
Pyar suraj bhi nahi ,
Jo chamke aur doob jaye
Pyar to naam hai saans ka
Jo chale toh zindagi aur
Ruke toh maut ban jaaye..!!

st: Pyar ke panno se bhari kitab ho tum,
s:
Pyar ke panno se bhari kitab ho tum,
Rishton ke phulo me gulab ho tum,
Kuchh log kehte hai ki pyar sacha nhi hota,
Un logon ke har sawaal ka jawab ho tum..!!

st: Meri chaahatein tumse alag kab hain,
s:
Meri chaahatein tumse alag kab hain,
Dil ki baatein tum se chhupi kab hain,
Tum saath raho dil me dhadkan ki jagah,
Phir zindagi ko saanso ki zarurat kab hai.

st: Ruth jao kitna bhi mana lenge,
s:
Ruth jao kitna bhi mana lenge,
Dur jao kitna bhi bula lenge
Dil aakhir dil hai sagar ki ret to nhi
Ki naam likh kar usse mita denge..!

st: Kyu tujhiko dekhna chahti h meri aankhe
s:
Kyu tujhiko dekhna chahti h meri aankhe
Kyu khamoshiya krti hai bs teri baatein,
Kyu itna chahane laga hoon tujhko main
Ki taare ginte huye kat-ti hai meri raatein
Tu hi kuchh bata de kya main karu inka
Hr pal jo mujhe tadpaati hai teri yaadein.

st: Tere pyar mein do pal ki zindagi bahut hain,
s:
Tere pyar mein do pal ki zindagi bahut hain,
Ek pal ki hansi or ek pal ki khushi bahut hai,
Yeh duniya mujhe jane, ya na jaane,
Teri aankhe mujhe pehchane yhi bahut hain.

st: Badi muddat se chaha hain tujhe,
s:
Badi muddat se chaha hain tujhe,
Badi duaon se paya hain tujhe,
Tujhe khone ki sochu bhi to kaise,
Kismat ki lakiro se churaya hai tuje

st: Usne mujhse pocha mujh bin
s:
Usne mujhse pocha mujh bin
Kaisi hoti hai tumhari zindagi.?
Maine bhi muskura kar uski
Aankhon ko band kar liya,
Aur pucha ab kya dikh raha hai…?
Usne kaha sirf andhera hi andhera!!
To maine kaha aeisi hoti hain
Tum bin meri zindagi….

st: Kisi ko pyar itna dena ki had na rahe,
s:
Kisi ko pyar itna dena ki had na rahe,
Par etbaar b itna rakna ki shak na rahe
Wafa itni karna ki bewafai naa ho,
Aur dua bus itni karna ki judai na ho

st: Pyar use karo jo tumse pyar kare,
s:
Pyar use karo jo tumse pyar kare,
Khud se b jyada tum par etbaar kare
Tum bas ek bar kaho ki ruko do pal,
Aur wo un do palo
Ke liye puri zindagi intezar kare…

st: Koi hain jiska ess dil ko intjaar hain..
s:
Koi hain jiska ess dil ko intjaar hain..
Khyalo mein bas usi ka khayal hain..
Khushyaan main saari us par luta du
Chahat me uski mai khud ko mita du
Kab ayega vo jiska es dil ko intjaar h…

st: Kash Dil ki awaz me itna asar ho jay,
s:
Kash Dil ki awaz me itna asar ho jay,
Hum apko yaad karen aur apko khabar ho jay,
Aaj kuda se itni hi dua hai,
aap jo bhi chaho vo haqiqat ho jay.

st: ar roz tere Deedar ki umeed hoti hai,
s:
ar roz tere Deedar ki umeed hoti hai, 
Dekhta hoon ke kab meri ye Eid hoti hai ,
Tujhse na baat ki kabhi na kuch Kaha maine, 
Dekhna hai kab is khamosh muhabbat ki jeet hoti hai..!!

st: Kbhi alfaaz bhul jau kabhi khayal bhul jaau
s:
Kbhi alfaaz bhul jau kabhi khayal bhul jaau
Tujhe es kadar chahu k apni saans bhul jau
Uth kar tere paas se jo main chal doon,
Toh jaate huye khud ko tere paas bhul jaau...

st: Takdeer Ke Aage Kisi Ki
s:
Takdeer Ke Aage Kisi Ki
Nahi Chalti
Jiski Chahat Ho Bas Wahi
Nahi Milti
Pyaar To Har Kisi Ko
Kahin Na Kahin
Zaroor Hota Hai
Par Jispe Dil Aa Jaye
Usi Ki
Mohabbat Nahi Milti......

st: Phir Chupke Se Yaad Aa Geya Koi;
Kuch Pal K Liye Mjhey Apni
s:
Kuch Pal K Liye Mjhey Apni
√üahon Mein Sula lena...
.
.
Agar....
.
.
Ankh Khuli To Utha Dena, Aur
agar Na Khuli To Dafna Dena.

st: Woh bhi soukeen hai,
s:
Woh bhi soukeen hai,
itne ki GOOGLE pr hamari sayri dhundte hai,
Unko lagta hai ki jajbaat bhi bazaar mai
Bikte hai..!!
